titleInfo.title: Fund raising Affair of Allied Jewish Campaign

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''1948, Fundraising affair of Allied Jewish Campaign, L-R ____, Tillye Levy, Alyce Lemle, speaker; Ida Mintz Cohen, Fanny Grimes, Rabbi Herbert Friedman., #505.'' Stamped on back of photograph: ''Albert O. Corwin, Commercial Photographer, Business Phone Alpine 2195, Residence Phone Alpine 8338, 19 East Eleventh Ave., Denver 3, Colorado.''

mods.abstract: Fund raising dinner for the Allied Jewish campaign. Seated at the head table left to right are an unidentified woman, Tillye Levy, Alyce Lemle, Ida Mintz Cohen, Fanny Grimes, and Rabbi Herbert Friedman.

name.namePart: Allied Jewish Community Council of Denver

mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
